config.backtools.prop.enabledTools.name: Enabled Tools
config.backtools.prop.enabledTools.desc: Enabled tools, by their resource name. Eg: minecraft:diamond_hoe. Putting any entry in this converts BackTools to a whitelist-only mod. Disabled Tools will be ignored.
config.backtools.prop.disabledTools.name: Disabled Tools
config.backtools.prop.disabledTools.desc: Disabled tools, by their resource name. Eg: minecraft:diamond_hoe
config.backtools.prop.toolOrientation.de: Tool orientation, by class file and degrees. Separate with ":" . See defaults for examples.
config.backtools.prop.nbtCleaner.name: NBT Cleaner
config.backtools.prop.nbtCleaner.desc: Some nbt tags will cause back tools to appear improperly. Use this setting to cleanse the item tags.
config.backtools.prop.enabledToolsID.des: Enabled tools, by their resource name. Eg: minecraft:diamond_hoe.
Enabled tools, by their Class name. Eg: net.minecraft.item.TieredItem.
config.backtools.prop.disabledToolsID.de: Disabled tools, by their resource name. Eg: minecraft:diamond_hoe
config.backtools.prop.disabledToolsClass: Disabled tools, by their Class name. Eg: net.minecraft.item.TieredItem
